author: covener
msg: propose a fix for mangling of error responses set by the filter chain

author: covener
msg: allow ap_invoke_handler() to pass-through AP_FILTER_ERROR as if it were
a reserved status code (OK/DECLINED/SUSPENDED). Prevents ap_die() from
seeing a 500 error when the http header filter has already taken
care of the proper error response

author: covener
msg: correct syntax of DirectoryIndex feature, CHANGES only

author: covener
msg: Prevent AP_FILTER_ERROR from being misinterpreted as SUSPENDED when checking
the status code returned by a handler by updating the values of the filter
error macros and consolidating them in httpd.h
